questions.question: What does the for...of loop give access to in terms of the current element?
What is a key advantage of using the for...of loop over the for-in loop in JavaScript?
options: D. It is optimized for arrays
questions.answer: D. It is optimized for arrays

questions.question: In JavaScript, which loop creates a loop iterating over iterable objects like Map and Set?
What type of objects should be avoided when using the for..in loop in JavaScript?
Which loop is suitable for iterating through the properties of an Object in JavaScript?
What is a key difference between for...of and for..in loops in JavaScript?
options: A. for...of is slower than for..in
B. for..in is used for arrays, for...of for objects
C. for...of is used for arrays, for..in for objects
D. for..in is easier to use than for...of

questions.question: Which loop is optimized for generic objects rather than arrays in JavaScript?
Why is the for..in loop not recommended for use with arrays in JavaScript?
options: A. It is easier to use than for-of loop
B. It is slower than for-of loop
C. It is faster than for-of loop
D. It is the same as for-of loop

questions.question: What kind of objects can the for...of loop iterate over in JavaScript?
Which loop allows you to conveniently loop through iterable objects like Arrays without managing incrementing logic manually?
